TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppSettingsReader extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a method for reading values of a particular type from the configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetValue (string key, Type type);
.method public hidebysig instance object GetValue(string key, class System.Type type) cil managed
public: System::Object ^ GetValue(System::String ^ key, Type ^ type);

Docs.param: The key for which to get the value.
The type of the object to return.
Docs.summary: Gets the value for a specified key from the property and returns an object of the specified type containing the value from the configuration.
Docs.returns: The value of the specified key.
